text: Who Is Killing the Great Chefs of Europe? is a 1978 German American black comedy movie directed by Ted Kotcheff and was based on the 1976 novel by Nan and Ivan Lyons. It stars George Segal, Jacqueline Bisset, Robert Morley, Jean- Pierre Cassel, Philippe Noiret, Jean Rochefort, Frank Windsor, Peter Sallis, Tim Barlow, Joss Ackland, Nigel Havers and Nicholas Ball. It was distributed by Warner Bros. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1978 comedy movies Category:1970s black comedy movies Category:German comedy movies Category:American black comedy movies Category:American serial killer movies Category:1970s serial killer movies Category:American criminal comedy movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies directed by Ted Kotcheff Category:Warner Bros. movies Category:Movies set in London Category:Movies set in Paris Category:Movies set in Venice Category:1970s criminal comedy movies Category:German crime movies Category:1970s English-language movies
title: Who Is Killing the Great Chefs of Europe?
